The length is determined by the distance between the start and end points of line_1 in Face 2 (0.5668 units), and the width is determined by the distance from line_1's start point to the arc's center point (0.5668 units). Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the given Euler Angles and Translation Vector. Draw a 2D sketch for this part. Scale the sketch using the sketch_scale parameter. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into 3D Sketch and extrude it along the vector normal to the sketch plane to generate the 3D model for this part. The operation specified for this part is "NewBodyFeatureOperation" which means it results in the creation of a new solid body. In natural language, it means to create a new solid model for this part.</description>
